div1.p: Hench requests a copy of Finlay's speech.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Francisco Dominguez Roldan, February 3, 1942
div1.opener:
February 3, 1942
Dr. Francisco Dominguez
Mendoza y Gutierrez
Marianao
Habana, Cuba
My dear Doctor Dominguez:
div1.p:
Thank you very kindly for your letter of
January 20 with its interesting information. If you ob-
tain a copy of Dr. Finlay's speech I would certainly be
grateful to have a copy. I have looked over the published
records of General Wood, that is the reports of the Governor
General in Cuba without finding r. Finlay's speech. I
hardly imagine it would be in it.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
